channel.title: Death Valley NP on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in Death Valley NP on Life At The Circus

item.title: The Many Sides of Death Valley
item.description: Donâ€™t get me wrong. Death Valley is aptly named. It is hot. Like crazy hot. Like 95 degrees at 7am, hot. And it is desolate. Like, LITERAL MIDDLE OF NOWHERE, desolate. Not a soul in site for miles and miles. And of course the signs everywhere warning you of heat stroke and death and the need for water. I get why they call it Death Valley. And quite a lot of the park looks like this.
